verses.name: Psalms 62:1
verses.text: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.

verses.name: Psalms 62:2
verses.text: He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.

verses.name: Psalms 62:3
verses.text: How long will ye imagine mischief against a man? ye shall be slain all of you: as a bowing wall shall ye be, and as a tottering fence.

verses.name: Psalms 62:4
verses.text: They only consult to cast him down from his excellency: they delight in lies: they bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 62:5
verses.text: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.

verses.name: Psalms 62:6
verses.text: He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.

verses.name: Psalms 62:7
verses.text: In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.

verses.name: Psalms 62:8
verses.text: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 62:9
verses.text: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.

verses.name: Psalms 62:10
verses.text: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.

verses.name: Psalms 62:11
verses.text: God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power belongeth unto God.

verses.name: Psalms 62:12
verses.text: Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.
